short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calculate GST just by selecting numbers

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
In India there is a tax on almost everything. But there one tax known as GST
(Goods and Services Tax). A lot of entrepreneurs have a spend a lot of time calculating it. That needs switching tabs, opening calculators etc... that causes loss of time and productivity. 

To solve this problem, I've created an extension that automates the calculations with just 2 clicks. 

1. Install this extension from the Chrome webstore.
2. Visit the website of your choice.
3. Select a number, right click. 
4. After Right click, Click on Calculate GST and you will get the results.

Built by https://linktr.ee/rustyrishi
